recipesJson.name: Feint
recipesJson.author: ConcreteRiver
recipesJson.description: A pina colada swisher.  A mash up of "If you like Pina Coladas" by ID10-T and my swisher base from 25 bucks.

reviews.text: My third favorite ConcreteRiver recipe to date. It tastes the way a pina colada cigarillo smells, which I'd forgotten was amazing until I tried it. ADV quality, went well with everything I tried alongside, from ice cream to steak & beans to black coffee.
